content.prompt: Which of the following is true of the position presented in the fourth and fifth sentences of the final paragraph (“The second . . . progress”) ?

choices.label: It takes issue with the claims made in the previous sentence.
It acknowledges that the solution to the problem will involve painful choices.
It emphasizes that immediate action is essential for success.
It suggests that an assumption held by many people may be incorrect.

skill.text: Skill 3.C: Explain ways claims are qualified through modifiers, counterarguments, and alternative perspectives.
